text2: Raan ci wo wɛɛr bei ne riɛmde , ago wo tɔ pɛle karɛckuɔ , ne dit de dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu ,

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: dhueeŋ ci ŋuak nyin tede wook ne pɛlenɔm ebɛn ku piathenɔm ebɛn .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Aci wo to ŋic ke nu e yepiɔu ke ɣɔn ci thiaan , ne miɛt e yenpiɔu . Yen aye loŋ ci lueel e yepiɔu ,

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: ne kede ciɛɛŋ bi en kaŋ cieŋ kedhie , te ci piny guɔ thok , an , abi kaŋ tɔ kut niim ebɛn , tɛɛu keek e Kritho cin , ayi ka nu paannhial , ayi ka nu e piny nɔm .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Abi ke taau e Kritho cin , raan ci wo tɔ yok ka buk lɔɔk lak , ne mɛk ci wo kɔn meek cit man ci Nhialic e lueel e yepiɔu , Raan e kerieec looi ebɛn , cit loŋ ci tak e yepiɔu ;

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: luɔi bi wok aa kɔc e dhueeŋde tɔ lec , wok kɔc ci Kritho kɔn ŋɔɔth .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Ku ye raan cak gam ayadaŋ week , te ca wek jam de yic piŋ , yen jam piɛth de kuny ci we kony wei : ku week , te ca wek guɔ gam , ke we ci gaar piɔth Weidit Ɣer , Wei ci kɔn lueel , an , bi gam wook ,

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: yen aye biak ci kɔn gam wook tueŋ , biak de ke buk lɔɔk lak , aɣet weer bi ke ci ɣɔɔc wɛɛr bei etaitai , ke dhueeŋde bi leec .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Ku yɛn aya , te can gamduon ca wek Bɛnydit Yecu gam piŋ , ku piɛŋ nhieer nhiaar wek kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: ke yɛn cii luɛl aa yɛn thieithieei lueel ne biakdun pal , wek aa lueel rin e lɔŋdiyic ;

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: ke Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho , yen aye Wun de nɔm lɛc , ke bi we miɔɔc ne wei ke pɛlenɔm ku nyuth bi we nyuoth kaŋ , luɔi ba wek e ŋic apiɛth ;

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: ke we bi tɔ daai apiɛth ne nyiin ke wepiɔth ; bak aŋɔth ŋic aŋɔth de cɔtdɛn ci en we cɔɔl , ku ŋiɛcki dhueeŋ bii Nhialic lɔɔk lak e kɔckɛn ɣerpiɔth yiic , dit diit en ,

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: ku bak riɛldɛn dit ŋic , dit diit en alal awar kerieec , riɛldɛn diit ci nyuoth wook wok kɔc ci gam , acit man e luɔi de riɛldɛn diit agok ,

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: riɛldɛn ɣɔn ci looi e Krithoyic , te ci en e jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic , go taau e ciin cuenyde paannhial ,

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: tenhial ya , aci miric kɔk woor kedhie alaldit , ayi ciɛɛŋ , ayi riɛl , ayi bɛɛny , ayi rin ci cak kedhie , acii e piny enɔɔne tei , ee piny bi bɛn aya , aci ke woor kedhie :

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: go kerieec taau e yecok ebɛn cieŋ ke , ku tɛɛu e kaŋ niim kedhie , ne kede kanithɔ ,

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: yen aye guopde , ku ye kuɛthde , kuɛth de raan e kaŋ tɔ kueth kedhie , ka nu e kerieecic ebɛn .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Ku we cii Nhialic tɔ ɣɔɔr , wek kɔc ɣɔn ci thou ne kakuon ee yak wooc , ku ne karɛckuon ee yak looi ;

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: karɛc yak cool e luɔɔi wek ke , ɣɔn rɛɛr wek e reer e kɔc ke pinye nɔm enɔɔne , reer e bɛnydiit cath ke rial e yomic , yen aye jɔŋ rɛɛc e luui e kɔc reec gam yiic enɔɔne .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Ku wook ayadaŋ wodhie , wok aa ye mat ne keek ɣɔn , ne ŋɔɔŋ de ka ke guop , ku wok aa ye kak e yok kɔɔr e yac looi , ayi kak e yok tak e wopiɔth ; agoku aa mith ke agɔth ne ciɛɛŋ e ciɛke wo , cit man e kɔc kɔk .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Ku Nhialic Raan kok piɔu alal , ne dit e nhieer e nhiɛɛr en wook ,

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: acakaa wok e ci thou e kakuɔn ee yok wooc yiic , ka ci wo tɔ ɣɔɔr ne Kritho etok , ( ee dhueeŋdepiɔu en aci we kony wei ) ,

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: ku aci wo jat nhial etok , ago wo tɔ rɛɛr etok paannhial ne Kritho Yecuyic :

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: luɔi bi en dit e dhueeŋ de yepiɔu nyuɔɔth wadaŋ thɛɛr ne piny bi bɛn , dhueeŋ diit war kerieec , ne miɛt mit en piɔu ke wook e Kritho Yecuyic :

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: ee dhueeŋdepiɔu en aci week kony wei , ne gam ; ku acii bɔ tede week : ee miɔc de Nhialic :

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: aci bɔ ne luɔi ee raan looi , ka cin raan dueer rot leec .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Wok ee cuɛcde , ne caŋ ci wo cak e Kritho Yecuyic ne kede luɔi piɛth cii Nhialic kɔn lueel , an , buk aa cool e looi wok keek .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Yen tak we weniim ecooke , yan , Ɣɔn wek e ye Juoor ne dhien e dhiethe week , we ci tɔ ye Jur kene cueel ne jur ci tɔ ye Aŋuɛl , e guopic , ee ke ci looi e kɔc cin ;

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: wek e cii thiaak e Kritho ɣɔn , wek e nu pei , ku caki e diil ke Yithrael , ku wek e ye kɔc lei , aa cin kedun thin e loŋ ci macic , loŋ de ke ci kɔn lueel , an , bi gam kɔc , wek aa cin ke ŋathki , ku iiu Nhialic tede week e piny nɔm .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Ku enɔɔne ne Kritho Yecuyic , wek kɔc waan nu temec , we ci bɛɛi tethiɔk ne riɛm de Kritho .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Yen aye man mɛte wook , raan e wo mat yiic waarou , tɔ wook e tok , ago pany nu kaamda dhuoor piny ,

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: ne nyiɛɛi ci en ater nyaai ne riŋ de yenguop , ater e loŋ de yic cok bi kɔc aa piŋ , ku ka bi kɔc aa looi ; bi raan toŋ ci piac looi cak ne guopdeyic , cak ne keek kaarou , ago ke maat aya :

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: bi en keek maat e Nhialic kek kaarou , ne guop tok ne tim ci riiu nɔm , ne nyiɛɛi ci en ater nyaai aya .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Na wen , ke bɔ , bi jam de mat bɛn guieer week , wek kɔc e nu temec , ku guiir kɔc e nu tethiɔk aya :

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: ku ne yen , wok waarou wo dueer ro cuot Waada ne Wei tok .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Yen enɔɔne , we cii be aa kɔc lei ku caki e buny lei , wek ee kɔc ke wun tok weke kɔc ɣerpiɔth ku yak kɔc ke dhien e Nhialic ,

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: we ci yik e kerkeeric keerkeer e tuuc ku nebii , ku Yecu Kritho guop yen aye kuur nu e agukic kuur de naamde ;

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: alooc ebɛn aci kieet nɔm e yen , abi dikedik , go ŋuak abi aa luaŋ diit ɣeric e Benyditic :

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: ku week aya , we ci yiek thin etok bak aa ɣon bi Nhialic cieŋ ne Weidit .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Yen aye yɛn raan e Yecu Kritho raan ci mac ne biakdun week wek Juoor ,

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: te ca wek kede luɔi e dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔuwe piŋ , luɔi ci gam ɛn e kedun :

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: luɔi ci en a tɔ ŋic jamcimoony , ne nyuoth ci en a nyuoth kaŋ ; acit man can e gɔɔr waan ne wel liaakaŋ .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Ku te kuɛn wek welki yiic , ke we dueer ŋinydi yokic , ŋiny ŋiec ɛn jam de Kritho jamcimoony ;

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: jam kene nyuoth kɔc e rem kɔk yiic , cit man cie nyuoth tuuckɛn ɣerpiɔth enɔɔne ku nebii ne Wei dit ;

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: jam de rom bi Juoor ke bi kɔc lɔɔk lak rɔm etok , ku luɔi bi kek aa guop tok , ku bik ke ci kɔn lueel rɔm etok e Krithoyic ne welpiɛth .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Ku yɛn ci tɔ ye raan e welpiɛthke looi , acit man ci a miɔɔc ne dhueeŋ e Nhialic piɔu ne luɔi de riɛlde luɔi e kaŋ tiiŋ yiic .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Yɛn guop , acakaa yɛn ee koor e kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie , yɛn e miɔɔc ne dhueeŋe , luɔi ban Juoor guieer ka ke Kritho , kek aye weu cii dueere gith niim ;

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: ku luɔi ban kɔc tɔ daai apiɛth kɔc kedhie , abik thar e jamcimoony ŋic , jam ɣɔn ci moony e Nhialicic te ɣɔn ciɛke piny , Nhialic Raan e cak kerieec ebɛn ne kede Kritho ;

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: ke pɛl e Nhialic nɔm , pɛl kithic alal , ke bi ŋic e ciɛɛŋ ku riɛl nu paannhial ne kanithɔ enɔɔne .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Yen loŋ ci lueel e yenpiɔu ɣɔn thɛɛr ne kede Kritho Yecu Bɛnydandit ,

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: raan ee wo tɔ ril nyiin , bi wo ro cuot tethiɔk ke wo cii nyiin riɔc ne gam ci wok e gam .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Yen a laŋ ɛn week , ke we cii piɔth bi bap ne katuc e ya dhal ne biakdun , yen aye dhueeŋdun .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Yen a tuok ɛn amiɔl e Waada nɔm Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho ,

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: Raan e ciek dhien rin kedhie , dhien nu paannhial ku dhien nu e piny nɔm ,

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: aguɔ lɔŋ , ke bi we gam riɛl ne dit e dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu , abak riɛl e riɛldit ne Weike e wepiɔth thin ;

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: ke Kritho bi reer e wepiɔth ne gam gam wek ; ago meikun ku keerkeerdun ɣet piny e nhieeric ,

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: ke we bi nhieer e Kritho leu ne yoŋ ba we yokic , week weke kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie , dit diit en kɔu , ku bɛɛr bɛɛr en kɔu , ku thuthde , ku bɛɛrde ,

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: aguɔki nhieerde ŋic , nhieer war ŋinydekaŋ , ke we bi kuɛth ne kuɛth e Nhialic ɛbɛn .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Ku enɔɔne , Raan leu kaŋ e luɔi alaldit awar ka yok lip ayi ka yok tak ebɛn , ne riɛldit ee luui e woyiic ,

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: e lɛc tɔu ke yen e kanithɔyic ne Kritho Yecu rem ebɛn aɣet wadaŋ thɛɛr . Amen .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Ya ki , yɛn ee raan ci mac ne kede Bɛnydit , wek laŋ nɔn ba wek reer e reer piɛth reer roŋ ke cɔt e cɔɔle week ,

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: ne kuur aa wek rot kuɔɔr piny , ku ne reer aa wek reer emaath , ku ne liɛɛr e wepiɔth , bak aa reer apiɛth etok ne nhieer ;

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: yak cok e thɛm wek apiɛth ke we bi piɔn toŋ de Weidit aa muk ne duot ci we duut e matic .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Ee guop tok yen nu , ku Weidit tok , acit man ci we cɔɔl ne aŋɔth tok , aŋɔth e cɔt e cɔɔle week ;

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Bɛnydiit tok , gam tok , baptinh tok ,

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Nhialic tok , Wun kɔc kedhie , nu e kɔc niim kedhie , ku ye luui e kɔc yiic kedhie , ku nu e weyiic wedhie .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Ku wo ci yien dhueeŋdepiɔu wo wodhie , acit man e them ci miɔc de Kritho thɛm wook .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Yen a lueel en en , yan , Ɣɔn le yen nhial , ke thel ke ye kɔc mac ke mac , Ku jɔ kɔc miɔɔc ne kaŋ .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: ( Ku lɔ e le yen nhial , ee kaŋo ? Cie ɣet ci en kɔn ɣet piny tethuth ya ayadaŋ ?

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Raan ci ɣet piny yenguop yen aye raan ci lɔ nhial ya aya , aci tenhial woor ebɛn aret , luɔi bi en kerieec thiɔɔŋ ebɛn . )

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Go kɔk gaam aye tuuc ; ku gɛɛm kɔk aye nebii , ku bi kɔk aa kɔc e welpiɛth guiir , ku bi kɔk aa kɔc e kɔc tiit ku kɔc e weet ;

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: ne luɔi bi kɔc ɣerpiɔth a dikedik , ku ne luɔi de kuny e kɔc rot kony , ku ne kuɛt bi guop de Kritho kueet ,

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: aɣet te bi wok ɣet wodhie ne gam toŋ ci wok gam etok , ku ne ŋiny ŋic wok Wen e Nhialic , agoku aa kɔc dit , ku buk ɣet e pek e dit de kuɛth cii Yecu kuɛth ;

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: ke wo cii bi bɛ aa mith thiaakaŋ , mith ee yom miaŋ ebɛn , leer ke tɛɛn ku leer ke tɛɛn , yom de weet e kɔc , ne math mɛthe kɔc kɔc erueeny , ku cap kithic ee kek kɔc math .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Wok bi yic dhil aa muk ne nhieer , ku yok dit e kerieecic ebɛn te nu yen , yen aye naamda , yen Kritho guop ;

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: ago guop dit ebɛn ne yen ne duot ci e duut apiɛth abi lɔ kuendek , ne yomnyiin ebɛn yomnyiin cath ne yen , acit luɔi ee ka ke raan guop looi ebɛn , kene ke luɔide ku kene ke luɔide , ago guop dit abi ro yik e nhieeric .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Yen a luɛɛl ɛn cooke , ke ya ye caatɔ e Bɛnyditic , an , Duoki e bɛ reer e reer e Juoor , kɔc e reer ke ke ye ɣɔric tak e keniim ,

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: kɔc col piɔth ku liuki e piir e Nhialicic ne biak de kuny kuc kek kaŋ , ku ne riɛl ril kek niim ;

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: kɔc cin piɔth , agoki rot gam luɔi de dhoom , bik luɔi col kithic aa looi ne ŋɔɔŋ e ke dɔm .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Ku week , we kene wɛɛt e Kritho wakya ,

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: te ca wek jamde piŋ , ku te ci we wɛɛt ne yen , ne weet yic nu e Yecuyin :

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: yan , bak raan thɛɛr pɔl , ne reerduon ee ya wek reer waan , raan ci dhiap ne biak de ŋɔɔŋ de lueth ŋɔɔŋ e ye dɔm ;

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: ku bɛki rot tɔ cak ne wei nu e wepiɔth ,

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: ku jaki raan ci piac cak dɔm , raan cii Nhialic caal piɔu , ne caŋ e ciɛkeye ne piathepiɔu ku ɣɛɛrepiɔu , ne yic .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Yen pal wek lueth , ku yak yin lueel , ŋɛk ke raan rɛɛr ke yen , luɔi raan wok .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Gɔthki , ku duoki kerac looi : duoki akɔl tɔ lɔ piny ke we ŋoot e wek goth :

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Duoki jɔŋdiit rac pɛl te bi en reer e wepiɔth .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Raan e ye kual , ne cie bɛ kual : aŋuan luɔi bi en aa luui e luɔi piɛth ne cinke , ke bi dɛ ke bi en raan miɔɔc , raan dɛk e kaŋ .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: E cin jam nhiɛɛny e bɛn bei e wethook , e ye jam piɛth etok , jam dueer kɔc kueet e ke dak keek , ke kɔc piŋ en ke ke bi dhueeŋdepiɔu yok .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Duoki Weidit Ɣer e Nhialic tɔ dhiau piɔth , Wei ci we gɔɔr piɔth e keek aɣet kool e wɛɛr weere kɔc bei eliŋliŋ .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Wel tuc ebɛn , ayi ditepiɔu , ayi agɔth , ayi jam arolrol , ayi jam rac ebɛn , e ke nyiɛɛiye e weyiic , keke luɔi anyaak ebɛn :

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: ku yak rot theek wapac , yak piɔth kok e rot , abak rot aa pɔl , e nɛk e ŋɛk pal ke ci wooc , cit man ci Nhialic we pɔl ne biak de Kritho .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Yen dam wek tau de Nhialicic , cit mithkɛn nhiɛɛr ;

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: ku rɛɛrki ne nhieeric , acit man ci Kritho wook nhiaar , ago ro gaam ne biakda , tɔ rot e ke ci gam Nhialic , ku nak , ago awau ci tumetum bɛɛi .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Ku bal , ayi luɔi col ebɛn , ayi wui de kalei , duoki ke tɔ luel rin e weyiic , aci piɛth tede kɔc ɣerpiɔth ;

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: ayi jam e rɔɔth , ayi jam ɣɔric , ayi alɛɛŋ rac , aciki piɛth kedhie : aŋuɛɛne lɛc de Nhialic .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Kene aŋiɛcki egɔk , yan , Acin raan e diaar kɔɔr , ku cin tiiŋ e roor kɔɔr , ku cin raan e luɔi col looi , ku cin raan e kalei woi , yen aye raan e yath lam , acin raan e keyiic , raan bi dɛ ke bi lɔɔk lak e ciɛɛŋ de Krithoyic keke Nhialic .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: E cin raan e we math e wel ɣaar yiic : agonh e Nhialic abɔ e kɔc reec gam niim ne biak de ka cit ekake .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Yen duo wek e rɔm etok ne keek ;

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: wek aa ye cuɔlepiny ɣɔn , ku enɔɔne , wek ee ɣɛɛrepiny e Bɛnyditic : rɛɛrki e reer e mith ke ɣɛɛrepiny .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Kak e ɣɛɛrepiny ke luɔk ayek luɔi de kepiɛth ebɛn ku piathepiɔu ku yin .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Yak ka mit e Nhialic piɔu thɔɔŋ e wepiɔth ;

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: ku duoki rot e mat ne luɔi de cuɔlepiny , luɔi cinic ke ye yok thin , aŋuɛɛn e luɔi ba wek kɔc loi en aa jɔɔny .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Ka yek looi ecueer ee ayaar te ciɛk , an , lueel ke .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Ku kaŋ kedhie , te ci ke jɔɔny , ayeke tɔ tiec ne ɣɛɛrepiny : ku te de en ke ye kaŋ tɔ tiec yen aye ɣɛɛrepiny .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Yen a lueel en en , yan , Jɔ paac , yin e raan nine , jɔt rot e kɔc ci thou yiic , ke yi bii Kritho riaau .

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Yen tiɛɛt wek rot , ku yak cath aŋiɛcki , cit kɔc pelniim , duoki e cath e cath e dhan ;

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: yak ka ke enɔɔne wɛɛr bei e keracic , ne rac rɛɛc akool .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Yen duo wek rot tɔ ye kɔc mum niim , yak rot tɔ ye kɔc ŋic kede piɔn e Bɛnydit .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Ku duoki rot e tɔ wit mɔu , ee mumenɔm bɛɛi ; yak rot tɔ thiaŋ e Weidit ;

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: yak jam wapac ne thaam ku diɛt kɔk ke Nhialic ku diɛt ke ka ke Wei , yak ket ku yak Nhialic piɔɔny e wepiɔth ;

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: yak cool e luɛɛl wek en , yan , Thieithieei Nhialic Waada , ne baŋ de kerieec ebɛn , ne rin ke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho ;

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: e ŋɛk e tɔu e ŋɛk cok ne rieeu rieu wek Kritho .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Wek diaar , yak tɔu e roorkun cok , roorkun gup , acit man tau wek e Bɛnydit cok .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Luɔi ee yen moc yen aye nɔm de tik , cit man ee Kritho nɔm de kanithɔ aya , ku yen aye kony de guop .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Ku acit man tɔu kanithɔ e Kritho cok , yen acit tau dueere diaar tɔu e roorken cok roorken gup ne kerieec ebɛn .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Ku wek roor , nhiaarki dieerkun acit man ci Kritho kanithɔ nhiaar aya , ago ro gaam ne biakde ;

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: luɔi bi en e tɔ ɣeric ewic , te ci en e tɔ piɛth , ne wɛk ci e waak e piu ne jam ,

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: luɔi bi en e taau e yenɔm , abi aa kanithɔ deyin dhueeŋ , ke cinic kethiin rac , ayi anyinn , ayi daŋ cit e kene aliu ; ku abi yic ɣɛɛr ewic ku cinic ke bi e gɔk .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Yen acit nhieer dueere roor dieerken nhiaar aya , cit man nhiɛɛr kek kegup . Raan nhiaar tiiŋde ke nhiaar rot :

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: acin raan ee riiŋ de yenguop maan anande ; aye muk apiɛth ku ye tiit apiɛth , cit man ee Benydit kanithɔ muk ku ye tiit apiɛth ;

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: e luɔi ee wok ka ke yenguop , ka ke riiŋde , ku ka ke yomke .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Yen abi moc wun pɔl ku pɛl man , ago ro mat ke tiiŋde , agoki aa riiŋ tok keek kaarou .

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Kene ee kecimoony e kɔc dhal aret : ku yɛn jam ne kede Kritho keke kanithɔ .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Ku week , raan ebɛn e ye tiiŋ de yenguop nhiaar cit man nhiɛɛr en rot ; ku tik e ye monyde rieu .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Wek mith , yak ka ke kɔc e dhieth week piŋ e Bɛnyditic : kene di , yen apiɛth .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: Ye wuur rieu keke moor ( kene ee cook tueŋ e loŋic cook deyic jam de ke bi gam raan ) ,

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: ke yi bi tɔu apiɛth , ku yin bi piir e run juec e piny nɔm .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Ku week , wek warken e mith , duoki mithkun e cool e juot wek kegup , abik gɔth ; ku yak ke muk e muŋ de Bɛnydit ayi weetde .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Wek liim , yak ka ke banykuon e week cieŋ gup piŋ , ne rieeu ku lɛthe guop , ne piɔn cinic anainai , cit man ee yen Kritho en luooiki ;

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: duoki e luui e ke woi kɔc , cit man e kɔc e kɔc math nyiin ; yak luui cit man e him ke Kritho , abak kede piɔn e Nhialic aa looi e wepiɔth thin ;

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: yak kaŋ looi ne piɔnmit , acit man e kede Bɛnydit , acie kede kɔc :

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: ne ŋiny ŋiɛc wek cooke , yan , Te de en kepiɛth ee raan looi , ke yen abi yok tede Bɛnydit , nɔn ee yen lim , ku nɔn ee yen raan e cath e kede yenhde .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Ku wek bany de niim him , yak luui wakie ayadaŋ tede liimkun , yak wɛi pɔl wɛi aa wek ke waai : ne ŋiny ŋiec wek cooke , yan , Bɛnydun week ayadaŋ anu paannhial , ku acin kueny ee yen kɔc kuany yiic .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Cook cieen , mithekɔckuɔ , yak riɛl e Bɛnyditic , ne riɛl diit ril en .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Yak weu ke tɔŋ taau e wegup kedhie , weu ke Nhialic , luɔi ba wek kɔɔc leu apiɛth ne ŋeeny aa wek cap de jɔŋdiit rac ŋɛny .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Wo cie wit ne riŋ ku riɛm , wok ee wit ne ciɛɛŋ , ayi riɛl , ayi banydit ke cuɔlepinye enɔɔne , ayi rɛm ke jɔɔk rac , rɛm nu tenhial , kek a wit wok e ke .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Yen naam wek weu ke tɔŋ ebɛn weu ke Nhialic , luɔi ba wek biok aa leu apiɛth ekool rac , ku te ca wek kaŋ thol kedhie , ke we bi tɔu e we kaac .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Yen aa wek kɔɔc , ke we ci weyiic duut ne thion cɔl yic , ku taauki ke ba wek weyoth kum , yen aye piathepiɔu ;

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: ku cɛŋki war e wecok , wɛɛr ke guiɛɛk de welpiɛth ke mat ;

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: ku awar kaŋ niim kedhie , namki kon e gam , kon ba wek tɔɔŋ aciɛɛr ke raan rac aa nɔk kedhie , tɔɔŋ de thook mac .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Ku namki akup de kunydewei aya , keke abatau de Weidit , yen aye jam de Nhialic :

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: ku yak cool e lɔŋ e akoolnyiin kedhie ne lɔŋ ebɛn ku pal e Wei yiic , ku yak cok e tiɛɛt wek rot e keyiic , ne ŋaŋ aa wek weniim ŋak aret ku pal aa wek pal ne biak de kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie ;

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: ku ne biakdi aya , luɔi bi a miɔɔc e jam ban athok liep ke ya cii riɔc , aguɔ jamcimoony ɣɔn tɔ ŋic , kek aye welpiɛth ,

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: ku luɔi aa yɛn tuny guiir keek , en a mac ɛn e joth : yak jɔ lɔŋ , ke ya bi jam e jam ban dhil jam , ke ya cii riɔc .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Ku enɔɔne , luɔi ba wek kaki ŋic , ku ŋiɛcki tau tau ɛn , we bi Tukiko tɔ ŋic kaŋ kedhie , yen aye mɛnhkenedan nhiaar , ku ye raan e kaŋ ŋiec dot ne luɔi de Bɛnydit :

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: ee ŋiny ba wek kakuɔ ŋic , ku muŋ bi en week muk piɔth , yen ke tuoc ɛn en week ka .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: E mat tɔu ke mithekɔckuɔ , ayi nhieer keke gam , ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: E dhueeŋdepiɔu tɔu ke kɔc kedhie kɔc nhiaar Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho ne piɔn agɔk . Amen .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Yɛn Paulo woke Timotheo , liim ke Yecu Kritho , awarek en gɛɛrku kɔc ɣerpiɔth e Kritho Yecuyin kedhie kɔc nu Pilipoi , keke kɔc e kɔc tht ayi kɔc e kake kanithɔ looi :

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: E dhueeŋdepiɔu tɔu ke week ayi mat , ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Yɛn e Nhialicdi leec ne taŋ aa yɛn cool e tak ɛn anɔm e week ,

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: ku lɔŋ aa yɛn cool e lɔŋ ne biakdun wedhie , ee miɛt e yɛnpiɔu yen aa yɛn lɔŋ ,

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: ne man ca wek rot mat e welpiɛth yiic , ɣɔn kan wek gam aɣɔl ci enɔɔne . Ku cooke aŋiɛc egɔk , yan , Raan e cak luɔi piɛth e weyiic abi thol abi piath ekool e Yecu Kritho .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Ku apiɛth aya nɔn ban kene thɔɔŋ e yapiɔu ne kedun week wedhie , luɔi aa yɛn we tak e yapiɔu , ne rom aa wek dhueeŋ rɔm ne yɛn etok wedhie , ne many mɛce yɛn ayi kuny aa yɛn welpiɛth kony ke ke bi kɔɔc aril .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Nhialic ee caatɔdi , ee taŋ aa yɛn we tak aret wedhie ne nhieer e Yecu Kritho .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Ku cooke yen a laŋ , ke nhieerdun bi lɔ ke lɔ abi dit aret ne ŋinydekaŋ ku puny aa wek kaŋ ŋiec pɔɔc yiic ebɛn ,

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: abak kapiɛth cok e ŋiɛc wek keek , ke we bi yiic awai ku cienki piɔth kerac aɣet kool e Kritho ;

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: ke we bi thiɔɔŋ piɔth e kak ee piathepiɔu ke luɔk , kak e bɔ tede Yecu Kritho , ke Nhialic bi dhueeŋ yok ayi lɛc .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Ku yɛn de piɔu luɔi ba wek e ŋic , wek mithekɔckuɔ , yan , Ka ca yok acik bɛn piath agoki welpiɛth tɔ lɔ tueŋ ;

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: ago many mɛce yɛn e biak de Kritho ago ŋic e kaldiit e bɛnydit ebɛn , ku ŋic e kɔc kɔk niim kedhie ;

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: ku tedit e mithekɔckuɔn nu e Bɛnyditic acik piɔth riɛl ne biak de many mɛce yɛn , agoki nyiin riɛl aret ne luɛl ee kek welpiɛth lueel ke ke cii riɔc .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Kɔk ayek ka ke Kritho guiir ne tiɛɛl tei , keke ater ; ku guiir kɔk ne piɔn piɛth aya .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Kɔcke ayek Kritho guiir ne teer e wel , aciki ke guiir ne piɔn agɔk , ayek lueel , yan , bik tuoc de many mɛce ya ŋuak ;

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: ku guiir kɔcke ne nhieer , aŋicki nɔn ci a dɔm ne kuny ban welpiɛth aa kony .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Jɔ aa ŋo ? Apiɛth tei , ee guieer ebɛn , nɔn ee yen rueeny , ku nɔn ee yen yin , ka ke Kritho ayeke guiir tei ; ku yen a miɛt ɛn piɔu , yeka , ku yɛn bi tɔu ke ya mit piɔu .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ne ŋiny ŋiɛc ɛn en nɔn bi kene piath ne kedi , ago ya kony ne lɔŋduon aa wek lɔŋ , ku ne miɔc ci wo miɔɔc ne Wei ke Yecu Kritho ,

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: acit man kaar ɛn en aret ku ŋaath , yan , bi cien ke ban yaar , ku yɛn bi nyin riɛl aret , ago Kritho lɛc yok e kedi enɔɔne , acit man ee yen en yok ecaŋɣɔn , ayi te pieer ɛn , ayi te thuɔɔu ɛn .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Ku tede yɛn , piir pieer ɛn ee Kritho , ku thon thuɔu ɛn ee kemit ba yok .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Ku te pieer ɛn e piny nɔm , ke yɛn bi kak e luɔidi ke luɔk yok ; ku ke ba lɔc e keyiic yen a ja kuc .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Yɛn e miɛn e kaamden kaarou , yɛn cii ŋɔɔŋ de jal dɔm , jal jal ɛn aguɔ tɔu woke Kritho etok , yen aŋuan aretdit .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Ku reer ban reer e piny nɔm aŋuan tede week .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Ku ŋiny ŋiɛc ɛn ekake egɔk , yen a ŋiɛc ɛn en nɔn ban tɔu , ku rɛɛr woke week wedhie , ke we bi lɔ tueŋ ku miɛtki piɔth e gam ,

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: ago lɛc lɛɛc wek rot ne kedi , ago aa dit e Kritho Yecuyic , ne tau ban bɛ tɔu woke week .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Yak tɔu apiɛth tei , ke taudun bi aa roŋ keke welpiɛth ke Kritho ; ku na miak , aca bɛn ba week bɛn tiŋ , ku na kɛn bɛn aya , ke yɛn dueer kedun piŋ , nɔn kaac wek aril ne piɔn tok , ku nɔn luɔɔi wek aret ne piɔn tok ne kede gam de welpiɛth .

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: Ku duoki wepiɔth e tɔ pau e kedaŋ ne kɔc dɛ wek ater . Aterdɛn ne week , yen aye ŋiny aa wek riaakden ŋic , ku ye ŋiny ba wek kunyduonewei ŋic , kuny e bɔ tede Nhialic .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Aci aa kedun ne biak aa wek Krithiyaan , acie luɔi ba wek kede Kritho gam tei , ee luɔi ba wek kerac aa guum aya ne biakde ;

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: wit aa wek wit enɔɔne ee wit cit ke cak tiŋ e yaguop , ku acit ke piɛŋki enɔɔne nɔn wiet ɛn .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Ku na de muŋdepiɔu nu e Krithoyic , ku na de luŋdepiɔu nu , luŋ bɔ e nhieeric , ku na de maath e Weidit nu , ku na de kokdepiou nu ,

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: ke we bi miɛt de yɛnpiɔu tɔ ye yic , ne luɛl aa wek jam tok lueel , ku dɛki nhieer toŋe , ku yak loŋ tok mat , ku cathki ne piɔn tok .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Duoki kaŋ e looi ne ater ayi lɛcderot , yak rot kuɔɔr piny , e ŋɛk e ye ŋɛk rieu awar rieeu rieu en rot .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: E ŋɛk cii ka ke yenguop e ŋic kapac , e ye ka ke kɔc kɔk ŋic ayadaŋ .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Yak cath ne piɔn kit keke piɔn waan cath ke Kritho Yecu ayadaŋ ;

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: acakaa yen e cit guop Nhialic , ke kit kit en keke Nhialic aken tɔ ye ke bi dhil muk aril , ku cii pal ,

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: ku aci dhueeŋde pɔl , ku tɔ rot cit lim , ago dhieeth ke cit guop raan ;

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: na wen , aci ciet guɔp raan , ke jɔ ro kuɔɔr piny , go ya raan e jam piŋ , athou en e thon rac , thon e tim ci riiu nɔm .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Yen aa jɔte Nhialic en nhial aret , ago miɔɔc e rin nu e rin niim kedhie ;

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: bi miɔl tuk kedhie ne rin ke Yecu , miɔl ke ka nu paannhial , ku ka nu e piny nɔm , ku ka nu e piny thar ,

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: go liep ebɛn Yecu Kritho gam , yan , ee Bɛnydit , ke Nhialic Waada bi dhueeŋ yok .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Yen ka , wek kɔckien nhiaar , acit man aa wek jam piŋ ecaŋɣɔn , ku acie te nuo yɛn etok , yak kunyduon e wei looi , kunydun guop , luɔiki abak thol ne riɔɔc ku lɛtheguop , ku bak cok e luɔɔi wek en aret enɔɔne te liɛɛu ɛn ;

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: ee Nhialic yen ee Raan e luui e weyiic bak kaŋ aa kɔɔr ku yak ke looi ayadaŋ , ka cit ka nu e yepiɔu .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Yak kerieec looi ebɛn ke we cii piɔth e dok ku caki e teer ;

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: ke we bi cien gaak ku cienki gup akɔɔk , mith ke Nhialic mith cii dueere gɔk e remic cii rem e cath edɔkdɔk ku ci ro yal e keracic , rem aa wek tic e keyiic cit man e mɛɛc e piny riaau ,

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: ku yak jam e piir mɔk nhial cit man e kuthyuni , yen aban dɛ ke ban rot leec ekool e Kritho , yan , acie ɣɔric en e riɛŋ ɛn , ku yen luɔɔi yɛn .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Yeka , ku na cak weiki luooŋ e yik nɔm , ku luuŋe ke e luɔi nɔm aya , luɔiduon e gam ca wek gam , ka mit e yapiɔu , ku yɛn mit piɔu woke week wedhie .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Ku yen acit miɛt duɛɛr wek piɔth miɛt ayadaŋ , abak piɔth ayum ne yɛn etok .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Ku yɛn ŋath Bɛnydit Yecu nɔn ban Timotheo dap tuoc week , ke yɛn bi yapiɔu riit aya , te can taudun ŋic .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Luɔi cien en raan cath ke yɛn raan cit piɔu en , raan bi aa diɛɛr e kakun ne yic .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Kɔc kedhie ayek kaken gup kɔɔr kapac , ku ciki ka ke Yecu Kritho e kɔɔr .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Ku we ye piathde yok , aŋiɛcki luɔi ee yen luui keke yɛn etok ne luɔi de welpiɛth , cit man ee meth wun luooi .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Yen aŋiɛc nɔn ban e dap tooc miak , te can jamdi tiŋ , tau bi en tɔu ;

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: ku yɛn ŋath Bɛnydit nɔn ban dap lɔ tede week yɛn guop aya .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Aca lueel tei , yan , ba Epaprodito dhil tuoc week , ee mɛnhkai , raan luui wok etok , ku yok biok etok , ku ye tunydun , raan ci a kony ne ka ci a dak ;

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: aca tooc , luɔi ci en we tak wedhie , ku aci wei miɛt , luɔi ca wek e piŋ nɔn e de en guop juai .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Ee yic , aa de guop juai waan , arek abi duɛɛr thou ; ku Nhialic aci piɔu kok ke yen , ku acie yen etok , e piɔu kok ke yɛn ayadaŋ , ke ya cii dhienepiɔu bi gieek .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Yen a kaar ɛn en aret nɔn tuoc ɛn en week , ke we bi piɔth miɛt , te ca wek e bɛ tiŋ , go dhien de yɛnpiɔu kuur .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Yen dam wek en e Bɛnyditic , ke we mit piɔth aret , ku yak kɔc cit en rieu gup ;

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: ee biak de luɔi de Kritho , yen aa dueer en thou , aci weike kuɔɔn , ke bi ke ci nɔm dak ne kuny ca wek a kony thiɔɔŋ nɔm .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Cook cieen , wek mithekɔckuɔ , yan , Yak piɔth miɛt e Bɛnyditic . Gaar gaar ɛn week e kamanke gup , acii yɛn e tɔ bap , ku ee kepiɛth tede week .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Yak rot tht e jɔk , yak rot tiit e kɔc e kerac looi , yak rot tiit e kɔc e rot tɔ ye aŋueel ;

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: ku wook , wok aye aŋueel yith , wok kɔc e lam e Weidit ke Nhialic , ku yok rot leec ne Kritho Yecu , ku cuku rot e ŋɔɔth e guop .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Ku yɛn aya , yɛn de ke duɛɛr ɛn ro ŋɔɔth e guop ; na de raan daŋ e ye lueel nɔn de en te dueer en ro ŋɔɔth e guop , ka waar ;

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: yɛn ci cueel ekool ee kekbɛt , yɛn ee jur cɔl Yithrael , raan e dhien e Benjamin , yɛn ee Eberu ci dhieeth e Eberuu ; ne kede loŋ , yɛn ee Parithai ;

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: ne kede lɛth lɛth ɛn yic , yɛn e kanithɔ yɔŋ ; ne kede piathepiɔu nu e loŋic , yɛn cin ke bi a gɔk .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Ku ka de naamdɛn dit tede yɛn waan , kek aca ke tɔ ye riaak tei ne biak de Kritho .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Yeka , ee yin , yɛn e kaŋ tɔ ye riaak tei kedhie , ne biak de piath war kerieec , piath de ŋiny ŋiɛc ɛn Kritho Yecu Bɛnydiitdi , raan ci riaak de kaki kedhie a tiiŋ nɔm ne biakde , ku aca ke tɔ ye wɛr tei , luɔi ban Kritho yok ,

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: ku luɔi bi a yok ke ya nu e yeyin , ke ya cath woke piathepiɔu , ku acie kedi , ke bɔ ne loŋ , ee ke bɔ ne gam , gam can Kritho gam , yen aye piathepiɔu e bɔ tede Nhialic , ne gam ;

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: ku luɔi ban e ŋic , ku ŋiɛc riɛl diit e jondɛn ci en ro jɔt , ku ŋiɛc rom ban ka ci guum rɔm woke yen etok , aguɔ guop kit woke yen ne thon ci en thou ;

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: nɔn bi dɛ te ba yɛn ɣet te nu jon bi kɔc jɔt bei e kɔc ci thou yiic .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Ku acie yoŋ can e guɔ yok en luɛɛl , ayi dik can guɔ dikedik : ku yɛn ŋoot e ya cop kedaŋ , nɔn de en te ban e dɔm , yen aye ke e dɔme yɛn e Kritho Ɣecu aya .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Mithekɔckuɔ , aca luel ne kede nɔn can e dɔm : ee cook tok en luɛɛl tci , yan , Ka nu cieen acan nɔm maar e ke , ku ja ro riɛɛny tueŋ te nu ka nu tueŋe ,

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: guɔ riŋ e ya lɔ tueŋ te nu ke ci keer , ke ya bi ariop lɔ yok , ariop de cɔt cii Nhialic kɔc cɔɔl e Kritho Yecuyic , cɔt de naamde .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Yen lueel wok en wukie , wok kɔc ci dikedik wodhie ; ku na de ke luɛlki pei , ke Nhialic abi we nyuoth ekene aya :

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: ku enɔɔne , te ci wo guɔ ɣet thin , jɔku cath e kueer toŋe , ku luelku jam toŋe .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Yak taudi dɔmic , wek mithekɔckuɔ , ku thɛkki kɔc e reer cit man e wok , wok kɔc ba wek tauden dɔmic .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Ku kɔc juec akucki reer enɔɔne , ku yɛn e keden cool e lɛk ɛn e week ecaŋɣon , ku lɛk week enɔɔne ke ya dhiau , yan , ayek kɔc de ater ne tim de Kritho tim ci riiu nɔm :

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: kedɛn bik yok rial ee riaak eliŋliŋ , yac en aye nhialicden , ku dhueeŋden ee yaar ee kek yaar , ayek kepiɔth tuom ka ke piny nɔm .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Ku wook , paanda ee paan nu nhial ; paan ee wok Konydewei tiit thin , yen aye Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho :

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: raan bi wo puk gup , gup cin naamden , luɔi bi en ke cueec abik kit e guopdɛn e dhueeŋ , ne luɔi de riɛldɛndit riɛl ee yen kaŋ ŋiec taau e yecok kedhie .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Yen ka , wek mithekɔckuɔn nhiaar , ku ca we tak , wek ee miɛt de yɛnpiɔu , ku yak gol e yɛnɔm , yak kɔɔc aril wakie e Bɛnyditic , wek kɔc nhiaar .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Yɛn lek Ewodia , ku lɛk Thuntuke , yan , Yak jam toŋe lueel e Bɛnyditic .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Ku yin , yin raan luui wok etok , raan yic , yin laŋ aya , an , bak dieerke kony , aake ye luui ne yɛn etok ne welpiɛth yiic , keke Keleme aya , ku kɔc kɔk e ye wok ke luui etok , kɔc cii rinken gɔɔr e awarek de piiric .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Yak piɔth miɛt e Bɛnyditic e akoolnyiin kedhie : abɛ nyɔkic , yan , Yak piɔth miɛt .

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Liɛɛr aa wek piɔth liɛɛr taki ŋic kɔc kedhie . Bɛnydit athiɔk .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: E cin ke ba wek piɔth diɛɛr ; ku ne kerieecic ebɛn yak ke kaarki tɔ ŋic Nhialic ne lɔŋ ku pal ku luɛl aa wek thieithieei lueel .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Ku man e Nhialic , man e kɔc dhal e ŋic kedhie , abi week gel piɔth ku gel ka yak tak e Kritho Yecuyic .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Cook cieen , mithekɔckuɔ , yan , Te de yen kak e yith , te de yen ka ye rieu , te de yen ka ye tiiŋ yiic , te de yen kaɣer yiic , te de yen ka ci lakelak , te de yen ka piɛth rin ; na de piath nu , ku na de lɛc nu , takki weniim e kake .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Ka cak ŋic ku ka cak yok ku ka cak piŋ ku ka cak tiŋ tede yɛn , kek luɔiki : ku Nhialic de mat abi tɔɔu ke week .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Ku yɛn e piɔu miɛt alal e Bɛnyditic , ne taŋ aa wek ɛn tak , nɔn ci en ro bɛ piac gɔl e kecieene , we ci a tak tei ecaŋaɣɔn , ku acin kool piɛth cak yok .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Ku acie dak dak ɛn e kaŋ en luɛɛl ɛn en : yɛn e weet , ka yɛn dueer piɔu aa lɔ yum , te de en ke ya yok .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Yɛn ŋic kuur dueere ya tɔ koor , ku ŋiɛc bany ba yɛn bany : ne kerieec ebɛn ku ne kaŋ yiic kedhie yɛn ci weet egɔk , kuɛth ban kuɛth , ku guom ban cɔk guum , ayi bany ban bany ayi dak ban dak e kaŋ .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Yɛn ee kerieec leu e luɔi ebɛn ne yen , yen raan e ya gam riɛl .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Ku we ye kepiɛth looi tei , ne man ca wek mat ne yɛn etok ne ketuc dhal ɛn .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Ku cooke aŋiɛcki aya , wek Pilipoi , ɣɔn ciɛke welpiɛth , ɣɔn jal ɛn e Makedonia , acin kanithɔ daŋ ci mat keke yɛn ne kede miɔc ku ne kede nɔm , ee week wapac ;

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: acakaa ɣɔn nuo yɛn e Thethalonika , we e kaŋ tɔ yine yɛn raanrou , ɣɔn ci kaki dak .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Acie miɔc en kaar ; ee ka ye luɔk ka bi aa kakun kek a kaar , juec bi kek juec .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Ku yɛn cath wo kerieec ebɛn , ku yɛn ci bany : yɛn e kuɛth , yɛn e kaŋ yok tede Epaprodito , kak e bɔ tede week , ee awau ci tumetum , ee lam piɛth , lam e Nhialic tɔ mit piɔu .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Ku Nhialicdi abi we tɔ kueth ne kadak week ebɛn ne juec e kakɛn nu paandɛn e dhueeŋ e Kritho Yecuyic .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ku enɔɔne , e lɛc tɔu keke Nhialic yen aye Waada , aɣet athɛɛr ya . Amen .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Thiecki kɔc ɣerpiɔth nu e Kritho Yecuyic kedhie . Wek thieec mithekɔckuɔn rɛɛr ne yɛn etok .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Wek thieec kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie , ku kɔc nu dhien e Kaithar acik we thieec alaldit .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: E dhueeŋ de Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho piɔu e ye tɔu ke week wedhie . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Yɛn Paulo , tuny de Yecu Kritho ne kede piɔn e Nhialic , woke Timotheo mɛnhkeneda ,

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: awarek en gɛɛrku kɔc ɣerpiɔth ku mithekɔckuɔn adoot e Krithoyin kɔc nu Kolothai : E dhueeŋdepiɔu e tɔu ke week ayi mat , ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Ayok cool e lueel , an , Thieithieei Nhialic Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho , ten ee wok lɔŋ ne biakdun ,

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: luɔi ci wok gamduon ca wek Kritho Yecu gam piŋ , ku piŋku nhieerduon aa wek kɔc ɣerpiɔth nhiaar kedhie ,

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: ne biak de aŋɔth ci kuɛt week paannhial . Ku aŋɔthe acak kede kɔn piŋ ɣɔn piɛŋ wek wel ke yin ,

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: welpiɛth ci ɣeet tede week ; acit man ci kek thiei e piny nɔm ebɛn aya , ku lokki abik juec . Ku acik luɔk e weyiic ayadaŋ , gɔl ekool ɣɔn piɛŋ wek dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu ku jaki yokic egɔk .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Acit man ca wek e piŋ tede Epapara raan e wok luui etok raan nhiaar . Ee raan adot raan e ka ke Kritho looi e biakdun ;

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: ku yen aa lek wook nhieerduon nu e Weiditic .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Yen aye wok cool e laŋ Nhialic ne biakdun acin pek , gɔl ekool ɣɔn kɔn wok e piŋ , ke we bi kuɛth e ŋiny ŋiɛc wek kede piɔnde ne pɛlenɔm ebɛn ku ne yoŋ aa wek ka ke wei yok yiic ,

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: ke reerdun bi roŋ keke reer e kɔc ke Bɛnydit , ke Bɛnydit bi piɔu miɛt aret . Yak luɔk ne luɔi piɛth ebɛn , ku ŋuakki wenyiin e ŋiny ŋiɛc wek Nhialic .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Yak riɛl e riɛl ebɛn , ne riɛldiit e dhueeŋde , bak kaŋ ŋiec guum ebɛn , ne liɛɛr e wepiɔth ku ne miɛtepiɔu ,

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: abak aa lueel , yan , Thiethieei Waada , Raan ci wo tɔ roŋ ne luɔi dueer wok dɛ keda ne ke bi kɔc ɣerpiɔth lɔɔk lak , kɔc nu teɣer .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Aci wo luak bei ne riɛl e cuɔlepinyin , ku tɛɛu wook e ciɛɛŋ de Wendɛn nhiɛɛric ;

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Wendɛn ci wo wɛɛr bei ne riɛmde , ago wo tɔ pɛle karɛckuɔ .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Yen acit guop Nhialic Raan cii dueere tiŋ , ku ye kɛɛi e ka ci cak ebɛn ;

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: kaŋ acike cak e yeyic kedhie , ka nu paannhial ayi ka nu e piny nɔm , ka dueere tiŋ ku ka cii dueere tiŋ , nɔn ee kek thony ke maliik , ku nɔn ee kek bany ceŋ piny , ku nɔn ee kek ciɛɛŋ , ku nɔn ee kek riɛl ; kaŋ aake cak ne yen kedhie , ku aake cak ne kede .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Ku yen anu e kaŋ niim tueŋ kedhie , ku tɔu kan kedhie ne yen .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Ku yen aye nɔm de guop , guop cɔl kanithɔ ; yen aye gɔle kaŋ , ee kɛɛi e kɔc ci thou yiic ; luɔi bi en nu tueŋ e kerieec ebɛn .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Aci miɛt e Wun piɔu luɔi bi en tɔu ke kuɛth aret ;

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: ago kaŋ tɔ luuke kedhie ne yen , ne luɛl ci en mat lueel ne riɛm de timdɛn ci riiu nɔm ; nɔn ee kek ka nu e piny nɔm , ku nɔn ee kek ka nu paannhial , ee Wende yen aa luuk ke .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Ku week , wek kɔc ɣɔn ci tɔ ye kɔc lei ku yak kɔc de piɔth ater ne yen ne luɔiduon rac , we ci luook ne yen enɔɔne ,

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: ne guopdɛn e riŋ , ne thon ci en thou , luɔi bi en we taau e yenɔm , ke we ɣerpiɔth ku cin gaak bi we gɔk , ku cin jany bi we jɔɔny ;

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: te ya wek cool e reer e gamdunic , abak kɔɔc aril ku caki e dap wiiki ku te kɛn wek rot rat wei e aŋɔthic aŋɔth e welpiɛth cak piŋ , wel ci guieer kɔc ci cak kedhie e piny nɔm ebɛn ; ke welpiɛth e ya yɛn kake looi yɛn Paulo .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Ku yɛn mit piɔu enɔɔne ne ka guoom ne biakdun , ku ka ci niim dak ne katuc ci Kritho guum , aya ke ke thiɔɔŋ niim e guopdiyin , ne biak de guopde , yen aye kanithɔ .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Ku yɛn ci tɔ ye raan e ka ke kanithɔ looi , ne tɛɛu cii Nhialic luɔi taau e yacin ne kedun , ba jam e Nhialic thol e guieer ,

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: yen jamcimoony ɣɔn thɛɛr e run ebɛn ku rɛm ebɛn , ku aci nyuoth kɔckɛn ɣerpiɔth enɔɔne .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Aci miɛt e Nhialic piɔu luɔi bi en keek tɔ ŋic dit de dhueeŋ de jamcimoonye e Juooric , yen aye tau tɔuwe Kritho e weyiic , ku ye aŋɔth de dhueeŋ .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Yen aye raan ee wok kede guiir , ke yok raan nen ebɛn ku yok raan wɛɛt ebɛn ne pɛlenɔm ebɛn , luɔi bi wok raan ebɛn taau e yenɔm ke ye piɔu dikedik e Kritho Yecuyic .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Ku yen aya yɛn rot nak piny e luɔi , cit man e raan wiet , ne riɛldɛn e luui e yaguop e luɔi ril aret .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Ku yɛn kɔɔr luɔi ba wek e ŋic biok diit aa yɛn biok ne biakdun , ku ne biak de kɔc nu Laodikia , ku ne biak de kɔc kɔk kedhie kɔc ken a tiŋ nyin e guopic ,

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: ke ke bi muk piɔth , ku matki etok ne nhieer , ku ne kuɛth bi kek kuɛth ne ŋiny ŋic kek kaŋ egɔk agoki jamcimoony de Nhialic ŋic , yen aye Kritho ,

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: raan ci ka piɛth ci kueet thiaan e yeyic ebɛn , ka ke pɛlenɔm ku ŋinydekaŋ .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Cooke en a luɛɛl , ke cin raan bi we math ne weŋ ee yen kɔc weŋ e yeiiep .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Ku yɛn , acakaa yɛn e liu guop , ke yɛn nu woke week e wei yiic , ke ya mit piɔu ne wui wɔi ɛn kut aa wek jamdun kiɛɛt ku kɔɔc kaac wek tedun aril ne gamduon nu e Krithoyic .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Yen ka , acit man ca wek Kritho Yecu Bɛnydit noom , yen rɛɛr wek e yeyin aya ,

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: ku taki meeidun ɣet e yeyic , ku we bi yik e yeyic , ku yak kɔɔc aril ne gamic , cit man ci we wɛɛt , ku yak kuɛth e gam abak thieithieei dap aa lueel .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Yak ro tht , ke cin raan bi we puk piɔth ne nhieer e pɛl ku ne rueeny ɣɔric , ne jam thɛɛr e kɔc , ku ne jam de jɔɔk ke piny nɔm , jam cie kede Kritho .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Yen aye raan reere kuɛth e Nhialic ebɛn e yeguop ,

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: ku we ci kuɛth e yen , raan nu e bany niim kedhie ku nu e riɛl nɔm ebɛn :

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: ku we ci cueel e yen ne cuɛl kene looi e raan cin , ee luny ca wek guop de riŋ luony bei , ne cuɛl cii Kritho we tɔ cuel ;

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: we ci tɔɔu ne yen etok ne baptith , ku we ci be jɔt thin aya , ne gam ca wek luɔi de Nhialic gam , Raan e jɔt en e kɔc ci thou yiic .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Ku week , wek kɔc ɣɔn ci thou ne karɛckun , ku ne luɔi kene riiŋdun cueel , we ci bɛ tɔ piir ne yen etok , te ci en karɛckuɔ pal wook kedhie ;

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: ku ci jam ci gɔɔr e looŋ yiic cuoth bei , ke de ater ke wook : ago nyaai e woyiic , ne pieet ci en e piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu ,

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: ɣɔn ci en bany yak ayi riɛl , tɔ ke e ka bi kɔc woi , ago keek thel ne tiɛm ci en ke tiaam e yen .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Yen duo wek rot e tɔ jieeny raan ne kede kecam ku ne kede ka dek ayi kool e ahith , ayi pɛɛi ci wil , ayi kool e thabath :

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: kake ayek atiep de ka bi bɛn ; ku guop ee kede Kritho .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Duoki rot tɔ pene raan ariopduon bak yok , ne kuur ee yen ro kuɔɔr piny ku lam ee yen tuucnhial lam , raan e pek e ke ci yok e nyuothic , ee rot tɔ dit e ɣɔric , ne piɔndɛn ci tuom ka ke piny ,

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: ku cii Nɔm e muk aril , Nɔm ee guop ebɛn tɔ dit e dit e Nhialic , ne muŋ ci e muk ku man ci en ro mat ne yomnyiin ku ral .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Ku te ca wek thou ne Kritho etok , te lɔ ka ke piny nɔm , eeŋo ya wek ka lueel kɔc piŋ , cit man pieer wek e piny nɔm ,

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: ke cit , Du ye jak ; du ye thieep ; du ye dɔm

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: ( kake kedhie ee ka bi dhiap ne luɔi looiye raan keek ) , ayek looŋ ke kɔc tei , ku weet e kɔc ?

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Kake ayek rot tɔ ye ka cit ka cath e pɛlenɔm , ne lam ee raan lam e kede yenpiɔu , ku ne kuur ee raan ro kuoor piny , ku rɛɛc ee raan eguop rɛɛc muk ; ku acinki naamden , ee kak e piɔu tɔ mit tei .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Ku enɔɔne , te ci we jat nhial ne Kritho etok , yak ka nu tenhial kɔɔr , te reere Kritho thin , ke rɛɛr e ciin cueny de Nhialic .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Yak wepiɔth tuom ka ke tenhial , duoki wepiɔth e tuom ka nu e piny nɔm .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Wek ci thou , di , ku piirdun aci thiaan keke Kritho e Nhialicic .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Miak , te tice Kritho piirda , ke we bi tic aya ne yen etok e dhueeŋic .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Yak ka ke wegup tɔ thou , ka nu e piny nɔm ; kɔɔrediaar , luɔi col , tum ee raan epiɔu tuom ka ke piny , ŋɔɔŋ de kerac , ku wui de kalei , yen aye lam de yieth .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Ee biak de kake yen a bi agonh e Nhialic e kɔc reec gam niim .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Ku wek aya we ye reer e kɔcke yiic , ɣɔn aa wek cool e luɔɔi wek kake .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Ku enɔɔne , palki kake kedhie ayadaŋ : agɔth , ditepiɔu , racdepiɔu , lɛɛt , jam e rɔɔth e bɛn bei e wethook .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: E ŋɛk cii ŋɛk e tɔɔr lueth , ne pal ca wek raan thɛɛr pɔl keke luɔide ,

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: ku cak raan e piac cak taau abak cieŋ , raan ee bɛ cak ke bi kaŋ ŋic egɔk , ku bi ciet tau de raan e cak en .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Ku tɛɛn acin Giriki nu ku cin Judai , ku cin aŋuɛl nu ku cin raan cie aŋuɛl , ayi Jur rɛɛc e ciɛɛŋde , ayi Thekuka , ayi lim , ayi raan e cath e kede yenhde , abi cien kedaŋ , ku Kritho yen aye kerieec ebɛn , ku nu e kaŋ yiic kedhie .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Yen dam wek piɔn e dap kok , cit kɔc cii Nhialic lɔc , kɔc ɣerpiɔth ku nhiaar ke , ku damki dhueeŋ , ku piɔn koor , ku kuur ee raan ro kuɔɔr piny , ku reer emaath , ku guom de kajuec ;

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: yak reer apiɛth etok , yak rot pɔl wapac , te de en raan de nɔm goony keke raan daŋ ; acit man ci Kritho we pɔl , ke we ye rot pɔl aya .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Ku ne kake yiic kedhie yak nhieer dɔm , yen aye ken ee kaŋ mat yiic abik a dikedik .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Yak man e Kritho tɔ rɛɛr e loŋ nɔm e wepiɔth , yen ee cɔt e cɔɔle week ne guop tokic ; ku yak dap lueel , an , Thieithieei .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Yak jam de Kritho tɔ rɛɛr e weyiic ne pɛlenɔm ebɛn , abak kuɛth e ye ; yak rot wɛɛt wapac ku yak weniim tak ne thaam ku diɛt ke Nhialic ku diɛt ke Weidit , ku yak Bɛnydit kɛt ne miɛt e wepiɔth .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Ku na de ke luɔɔiki , nɔn ee yen jam ku nɔn ee yen luɔi , yak ke looi ebɛn ne rin ke Bɛnydit Yecu , ke we ye Nhialic Waada yɔɔk , yan , Thieithieei , ne kede .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Wek diaar , yak tɔu e roorkun cok , cit man roŋ en e Bɛnyditic .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Wek roor , nhiaarki dieerkun , ku duoki piɔth e rac e keek .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Wek mith , yak ka ke kɔc e dhieth week piŋ e kerieecic ebɛn , kene amit e Nhialic piɔu .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Wek warken e mith , duoki mithkun e jut e jam , ke ke cii piɔth bi bap .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Wek liim , yak ka ke banykun piŋ , bany ceŋ wegup ; duoki e luui e ke woi kɔc , cit man e kɔc e kɔc math nyiin , yak luui ne piɔn cinic anainai , ne rieeu rieu wek Nhialic .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Na de ke luɔɔiki , ke luɔɔiki e wepiɔth thin ; cit man aa wek Bɛnydit luooi , ku cakki kɔc e luooi tei ;

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: ne ŋiny ŋiɛc wek cooke , yan , Ee tede Bɛnydit , yen ba wek kaŋ lɔɔk lak ka bi aa ariopdun ; ee Bɛnydit Kritho yen luɔɔiki .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Ku raan e kerac looi abi kede yok ne kerɛɛc ci looi ; ku kueny bi kɔc aa kuany yiic aliu .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Wek bany de him , yak himkun gam ka roŋ e luɔiden , yak ke miɔɔc e ke kieetki ; aŋiɛcki nɔn dɛ wek Bɛnydun aya paannhial .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Yak cok e cuɔɔl wek e lɔŋ , ku yak ro tiit thin ne luɛl aa wek e dap lueel , yan , Thieithieei ;

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: ku yak lɔŋ ne biakdi ayadaŋ , ke Nhialic bi wo liep ɣot thok , ɣon e guieer e wel , buk jam de Kritho aa guiir , jamcimoony , jam ci a mac ne biakde aya ;

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: yak lɔŋ , ke ya bi jam tɔ tiec egɔk , cit man aa yɛn en dhil lueel .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
